Package nl.strohalm.cyclos.controls.reports.statistics

Class Summary
StatisticalTransferDTO  
StatisticsAction The common ancestor for all statistics actions.
StatisticsActivityAction Shows a list of statistics to select
StatisticsActivityForm form used for showing statistics
StatisticsFinancesAction Shows a list with statistics to select.
StatisticsFinancesForm form used for showing statistics
StatisticsForm common ancestor form for all statistics
StatisticsKeyDevelopmentsAction Shows a list with statistics to select, and calls the service to create the stats after clicking submit.
StatisticsKeyDevelopmentsForm form used for showing statistics
StatisticsSelectAction Action for displaying the statistic report
StatisticsTaxesAction Shows a list with statistics to select.
StatisticsTaxesForm form used for showing statistics
 

Enum Summary
StatisticsAction.StatisticsType Enumeration to indicate what type of statistics will be shown
